{{ absence.studentID }} {{ absence.student.cne }} {{ absence.cours.name }}--{{ absence.cours.annee }} {{ absence.nbrAbsence }}
import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {AbsenceService} from "../services/absence.service"; import {Absence} from "../models/Absence.model"; @Component({ selector: 'app-absecnce', templateUrl: './absence.component.html', styleUrls: ['./absence.component.css'] }) export class AbsenceComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private absenceService : AbsenceService) {} erreurMessage!: object; absences !: Array; ngOnInit(): void { this.absenceService.getAbsences().subscribe({ next:(data)=>{ console.log(data) this.absences=data },error:(err)=>{ this.erreurMessage=err.message; console.log(err) } }) } handleUpdateAbsence(absence: Absence) { } handleDeleteAbsence(absence: Absence) { } }
